revised_title: Experimental Researches on Steam Density and Expansion
tldr: This article presents experimental research conducted by William Fairbairn and Thomas Tate to determine the density of steam at different temperatures and the law of expansion of superheated steam. They developed a method using a saturation gauge to measure the exact temperature at which water is completely vaporized, overcoming the challenges of previous experiments. Their findings contribute to understanding the behavior of steam and its applications in steam engines and other industries.
